Meet the team


We are the Gecko and Tardigrade Gang. We love geckos and Tardigrades. Big, small, fat, thin, green or brown. For all your informational needs on geckos and tardigrades, we are the team to contact. Nelson, Sam, Karina, James and Stuart, Haroon, Hamid, Aurelija, Ross, Erika or Ben are waiting for your gecko call.
